message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As we're both aware, this product is worth $10000 to you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your life and business.
Alice, thanks for the offer. It's a good starting point, but I'm hoping to get a better price. I'm willing to pay $8500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to get a better price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8500. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $8800. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your life and business, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get an amazing deal. Let me know what you think.
